articles.title: Twitter says its image-cropping algorithm was biased, so it's ditching it - CNN
articles.description: Twitter has largely abandoned an image-cropping algorithm after determining the automated system was biased. Some users complained it had a preference toward showing pictures of white people in previews of tweets.
